name: Dino-Store: Shopping in a Pandemic (rwinstead)
description:
Welcome to Dino-Store, a single-player game centered around the simple task of going to the grocery store. It’s your child’s birthday, and you have to collect all of the treats and gifts to make it perfect.

Except, there’s one problem -- it’s the middle of a pandemic, and other dinos aren’t exactly being cautious. 

Can you buy everything you need, while avoiding bringing home the virus that’s going around?
